duties_responsibilities.duty: Work in a targeted solution space using programming, optical modeling, simulation, and optimization skills to produce optical components.
Design and build metrology validation systems of optical components in a cross-functional team.
Develop expertise in ray tracing software (ZEMAX, Code V, FRED, etc) and utilize it for optical component design and validation.
Utilize Python programming skills, including notebooks and server usage, in the design, modeling, and benchtop systems of optical components.
Conduct electromagnetic wave simulation using FDTD and RCWA algorithms to develop and optimize optical components.
Engage in 90% simulation and modeling work related to optical propagation, and act as a self-starter who actively seeks out answers, follows through, and manages time effectively.
Regularly collaborate with the team to refine strategies based on the analysis of market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or relevant field (Master's degree preferred)
